verbs.description: [ARG1: A former Trump University professor] [V: wakes] up [ARGM-TMP: every morning] [ARGM-MNR: with one wish] — [C-ARG1: that special counsel Robert Mueller will interview President Donald Trump] .
A former Trump University professor wakes up every morning with one wish — that special counsel Robert Mueller [V: will] interview President Donald Trump .
